messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Stella...
messages.msgSnippet: I read a suggestion somewhere ages ago (might have been Do Not Disturd, by Deborah Jackson) for a playgroup type thing where mothers had a cleaning circle,
messages.messageBody:
I read a suggestion somewhere ages ago (might have been Do
Not Disturd, by Deborah Jackson) for a 'playgroup' type thing
where mothers had a cleaning circle, they went to each others
houses and got all the stuff done while the kids played togethr, I
thought this was such a neat idea, shame I haven't found anyone
to do this with, but there again I've just remembered it...

Tracy

On 8 Jul 2000, at 1:25, Cathie _ wrote:

I went to someones house the other day and I was just
itchin to clean it. I 
am a slob, myself, but cleaning someone elses house is
different. Too bad we 
are all so far apart-we could just trade off and clean
for each other!

messages.subject: RE: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Stella...
messages.msgSnippet: ... My sister said that she knows a bunch of women who get together and have a cleaning co-op. Kinda like I ll help you clean  your house if you help me clean
messages.messageBody:
> Not a bad thought, except we would never be able to
> find anything in our own house. We would be calling
> each other to ask where things are.
>
> Nanci K.
>
>
My sister said that she knows a bunch of women who get
together and have a cleaning co-op. Kinda like I'll
help you clean your house if you help me clean mine.
She said that before she knew they were doing this she
was embarrassed because their houses were so much
cleaner than hers. Now that she knows she doesn't feel
so bad.

__________________________________________________

Not a bad thought, except we would never be able to find anything in our own house. We would be calling each other to ask where things are.

Nanci K.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Stella...
messages.msgSnippet: hi nancy, yes please i will email you separately, tried to send to your email address but must have typed it wrong because the message came back. thanks stella
messages.messageBody:
hi nancy, yes please i will email you separately, tried to send
to your email address but must have typed it wrong because the
message came back.
thanks
stella
----- Original Message -----
From: Nanci and Thomas Kuykendall <tn-k4of5@...>
To: <unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 9:22 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Stella...


> >In short I have got to the point where I don't feel that I can
> >make our house look like a house anymore......
> I enjoy being with my children but I do not enjoy our house at
> >the moment. I daren't invite anyone in :o)
> >Stella
>
> Hey Stella. I am an organizer by nature, and your house sounds
like one I would have a fabulous time in, if you were to let me
loose to help with your space and clutter issues. If you would
like to talk more about it privately, feel free to email me, and
maybe I can help you brainstorm ideas about what to do.
>
> Nanci K.

messages.subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Stella...
messages.msgSnippet: ... I enjoy being with my children but I do not enjoy our house at ... Hey Stella.  I am an organizer by nature, and your house sounds like one I would have a
messages.messageBody:
>In short I have got to the point where I don't feel that I can
>make our house look like a house anymore......
I enjoy being with my children but I do not enjoy our house at
>the moment. I daren't invite anyone in :o)
>Stella

Hey Stella. I am an organizer by nature, and your house sounds like one I would have a fabulous time in, if you were to let me loose to help with your space and clutter issues. If you would like to talk more about it privately, feel free to email me, and maybe I can help you brainstorm ideas about what to do.

Nanci K.
